reviewText: Good video to give to family members who won't listen to warnings about future events in Biblical prophecy. Heartwarming way that a young man tells his family what he believes.
i ordered this movie for a friend of mine he says very good price was good also if my friend says if you looking for a good strong christian movie then look into this one

This video is extremely moving as it shows the agony of a young man who has accepted Jesus Christ as his Savior, and has the assurance of eternal life in the event that the Rapture (when Jesus calls all His saved Believers to be caught up in the air with Him)ocurrs.  His heart-break is over his family who for various reasons, have no time for the Lord in their life.  Because of a dream he had the night before, he is compelled to try to reach his family one more time.  You can't help but be moved by this video.
